trans-unit.source: Provides information about the SharePoint site (that is, the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c>) that is represented by a SharePoint site node in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 介绍由服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 站点节点表示的 SharePoint 站点（即 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c>）。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerSiteNodeInfo> object from the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A> property of each <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode> that represents a SharePoint site node.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerSiteNodeInfo>对象<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A>每个属性<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode>表示 SharePoint 站点节点。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending the SharePoint Connections Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 连接节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> that is represented by the SharePoint site node.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SharePoint 站点节点表示的 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> 的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> that is represented by the SharePoint site node.
trans-unit.target: ID <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c>表示的 SharePoint 站点节点。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the SharePoint site node is the immediate child of the **SharePoint Connections** node in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 SharePoint 站点节点是否是服务器资源管理器中的“SharePoint 连接”节点的直接子节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the SharePoint site node is the immediate child of the **SharePoint Connections** node in **Server Explorer**; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果 SharePoint 站点节点是直接子级的**SharePoint 连接**中的节点**服务器资源管理器**; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> that is represented by the SharePoint site node is the RootWeb of its site collection (<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c>).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 SharePoint 站点节点表示的 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> 是否是其站点集合 (<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c>) 的 RootWeb。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> that is represented by the SharePoint site node is the RootWeb of its site collection (<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c>); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> ，它是由 SharePoint 站点节点是其站点集合的根网站上 (<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite</c>); 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> that is represented by the SharePoint site node.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SharePoint 站点节点表示的 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> that is represented by the SharePoint site node.
trans-unit.target: 名称<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c>表示的 SharePoint 站点节点。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> that is represented by the SharePoint site node.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SharePoint 站点节点表示的 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> 的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c> that is represented by the SharePoint site node.
trans-unit.target: URL <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c>表示的 SharePoint 站点节点。
